data.actual_result: Its does not have any blackening
data.expected_result: It should have blacked because we clicked a button
data.short_description: No blackening (The thing comes up when you click something) comes when you press *Test My Microphone*)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings - Voice settings - Click the *Test my microphone* button - As normally , when you click a button or icon a blackening or we can say something comes out that shows you clicked would come, but on that button it does not work
